name: Fire Bolt
description: Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, target takes 1d10 fire damage. Scales with level (5th: 2d10, 11th: 3d10, 17th: 4d10).

name: Guidance
description: Touch a willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice.

name: Mage Armor
description: A willing creature without armor gains AC 13 + Dex modifier for the duration. The spell ends if the target dons armor.

name: Magic Missile
description: Create three glowing darts of force. Each hits a creature of your choice for 1d4+1 force damage. Higher levels: one additional dart per slot level above 1st.

name: Cure Wounds
description: A creature you touch regains hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. Higher levels: +1d8 per slot above 1st.

name: Shield
description: When you are hit by an attack or targeted by Magic Missile, gain +5 AC until start of next turn and take no damage from Magic Missile.
